::Spears::

She walked along with Striker.  She was leaning on her staff while 
she walked.  Her side was damp from the mech fluid leaking out.  She 
looked at the knife that she had pulled out of her arm. She wiped it 
off and put it in a small hip compartment.  She smiled. One of these 
days I'll return Serpentor's knife to him, she thought.

"Do we have to fly back? can't we walk?" She wasn't at all happy 
about flying again.
